REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F A f2801 reute r f BC-ELSINORE-<ELS>-SETS-D 06-29 0087

TEXT.TITLE: ELSINORE <ELS> SETS DEPOSIT ON BONDS
TEXT.BODY:
Elsinore Corp said it deposited 5,795,833 dlrs with Manufacturers Hanover Trust Co the trustee of its Elsinore Finance Corp unit's 15-1/2 pct senior mortgage bonds due 1999. The deposit represents the balance of accrued and unpaid interest on the bonds thorugh June 30, 1986. Elsinore Corp has guaranteed payment on the bonds. Payment of this amount, about 50.40 dlrs per 1,000 dlrs principal, will be made on July 14 to shareholders of record July 13.
Reuter
